ISSUE.TITLE: Visualization Editor: X Column combo box does not accept keyboard input
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary You can search for column names in the Visualization Editor's combo boxes. But this feature is broken for the **X Column**. After I click the widget I don't see a blinking insertion point like on the other boxes. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Run a query with at least one column 2. Add a new visualization 3. Click the **X Column** combo box and _type_ a column name I noticed this in my local environment as of 19c6d33. But also reproduced it on SaaS. ### Technical details: * Redash Version: V9 * Browser/OS: FF * How did you install Redash: Saas / Docker
